articles.title: 2 Americans Dead, More Than 200 At Risk Of Fungal Meningitis After Cosmetic Surgeries In Mexico - NDTV
articles.description: Two Americans have died due to a suspected fungal meningitis outbreak after having surgery under epidural anesthesia in Matamoros, Mexico.
articles.content:
Both patients had undergone liposuction

articles.title: Judge rules Colorado student cannot wear a sash with Mexican and American flags during graduation - CNN
articles.description: A federal judge has ruled for a Colorado school district after a student sued to wear a sash reflecting the Mexican and American flags at graduation Saturday.
articles.content:
